reviews.review_msg: Takes boring material and makes it extremely interesting. He has interesting side stories for almost every single topic and makes sure that no one in the class is bored. At the same time he is a very *very* hard marker. If you do not understand a single topic covered he will ream you on the tests. Worth it if you want to learn a lot.

At the same time he is a very *very* hard marker. If you do not understand a single topic covered he will ream you on the tests. Worth it if you want to learn a lot but avoid if yo

Like another commenter said before, going to his class is a pleasure. He makes geography interesting. He may be an extremely hard marker but his lectures relate to current events and enjoyable. He also gives you a 4 chances in the resource management quiz which is quite lenient.
